content: just got back to nyc and i'm wide awake as usual. grabbed a coffee in williamsburg and it hit different. feels like home. back to the grind with the job hunt
raw_content: I'm back in NYC, the city that never sleeps, and neither do I. Just had coffee at the old haunt in Williamsburg. Feels good to be home, but the job hunt begins anew.

content: had a great brunch chat with my mentor about using AI for market stuff. also, turning 22 feels like a sign to turn all those Ls into Ws.
raw_content: Had an insightful chat with my mentor over brunch. We discussed how I could leverage AI tools for better market analysis. Also, my 22nd birthday came with a realization: time to turn setbacks into comebacks.
